para.text: The owner of a skills-based amusement device shall register with the Commission every other year if the device awards prizes other than the award of free play.
A person required to register shall provide in a manner specified by the Commission:
The name and address of owner of the device;
The address of the location where the device is operated;
A total count of the devices in operation with an indication whether the device is:
Another type of skills-based amusement device;
Evidence of payment of admissions and amusement taxes as authorized under Tax General Article, Title 4, Annotated Code of Maryland; and
Any additional information required by the Commission.
For each device registered under this chapter, the Commission shall:
Assign a skills-based amusement device registration number; and
Issue a registration certificate and sticker.
The owner of a skills-based amusement device required to register under this chapter shall adhere the registration sticker to the device in a location visible to inspection.
An owner registered under this regulation may operate skills-based amusement devices in accordance with this subtitle.
